## Emitter.has() method

Returns `true` if this emmiter has a listener attached to the `key` event type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
has(key: AnyEventTypeOf<EventMap>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | [AnyEventTypeOf](./emitter.anyeventtypeof.md)<!-- -->&lt;EventMap&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
